title: Is Sikkim Manipal BBA distance education acceptable for higher education overseas? Is it valid for the US, Canada, Ireland, etc. for PR and job related documentation? - Quora

response.answer_text: It seems that the covid has exposed a very practical mode of sharing and educating people all over the world without the high fees, visa issue, etc. So many accredited institutions, some very well respected, are offering distance learning course, which for a small fee will give you accredited degree courses. Recently tuition fees have risen so high that only the very rich could afford education. We have a long way to go yet to fully exploit the internet medium. Go for it, Athullya.
I’m pretty sure its not , but you can contact the relevant authorities to verify any such views .
